p: Cats presenting with ≥1 sign consistent with FCV‐VSD during the outbreaks were included. Viral isolation and whole genome sequencing were performed on residual diagnostic oropharyngeal swabs and/or necropsy tissue. One virus from each outbreak was tested in plaque reduction assays against nitazoxanide (NTZ), 2’‐C‐methylcytidine (2CMC) and NITD‐008. For each antiviral, EC 50 was determined. Therapeutic index (TI) was derived from the EC 50 and half maximal cytotoxic concentration in CRFK cells.
